stat_fields.attunements: Stat scaling weights (AT_COURAGE, AT_SPIRIT, AT_GRACE). Higher value = more damage scaling from that attribute.
stat_fields.requirements: Minimum attribute levels needed to equip the weapon.
stat_fields.ChargeDamageMultiplier: Damage multiplier range for charged attacks {min, max}.
stat_fields.ChargeStabilityDamageMulti: Stability damage multiplier for charged attacks.
stat_fields.ChargeArmourBypassPct: Armour bypass percentage for charged attacks.
stat_fields.projectiles: Ranged attack projectile data with separate damage values.
